English:
Whoa!
Is this the ghost you were talking about?
Chinese:
哇啊啊！？
這就是你說過的幽靈嗎？
German:
Oha!
Ist das der Geist, von dem du geredet hast?

English: It went and disappeared on us.

Ooh, are you scared?
Do you want to do this mystical chant?
You know it? It starts off RIN! PYO! TO! SHA!
Chinese:
喔？嚇傻了？
念一下九字真言吧？
知道那是什麼嗎？「臨！兵！鬥！者！」的那個！
Korean:
헤~이, 쫄고 있어?
…가볍게 주문이라도 외울까?
알고 있어? 임! 병! 투! 자! 라는 그거
German:
Oh, hast du Angst?
Magst du eine geheimnisvolle Mantra sagen?
Kennst du die? Fängt an mit „RIN! PYO! TO! SHA!“

English:
Knock it off. Do you know who that was?
Do you even have a clue who it might be?
Chinese:
喂……你……該不會知道他是誰吧？
或者說，你感覺自己似乎認識他嗎？
Korean:
저기 말이야, 댁… 저 녀석이 누군지, 혹시 알아?
…그보다, 아는 것 같은 느낌이 들지 않아?
German:
Lass den Quatsch. Weißt du, wer das war?
Hast du eine Ahnung, wer es sein könnte?

English: I'm imagining things, that's all. Yeah.
German: Ich bilde mir nur Sachen ein. Das muss es sein.

English:
If his theory is correct, taking the Eater down
will also collapse this strange phenomenon.
Chinese:
如果那個大叔的推論沒錯……
只要打倒這傢伙，這個奇怪的現象就會消失。
Korean:
그 아저씨의 추론이라는 게 맞다면…
이 녀석을 쓰러뜨리면, 이 기묘한 현상도 사라진다는 거군
German:
Wenn die Theorie stimmt, dann kollabiert dieses
ganze komische Phänomen, sobald wir den
Verschlinger erledigen.

English:
Right? And if that happens, what happens to us,
who are inside of that phenomenon?
Chinese:
嗯……？可是如果這裡消失了，那在裡面的我們……
會怎樣呢？
Korean:
…응? 그런데 이곳이 사라지면, 안에 있는 우리들은
어떻게 되는 거지?
German:
Ja, nicht wahr? Und dann? Was passiert dann mit
uns, die im Phänomen drinstecken?

English:
We gotta do it!
I want to get away.
Chinese:
現在只能硬著頭皮上了！
我想逃出去……
German:
Es muss sein!
Ich will hier weg.

English: Thanks for saying what I was thinking.
Chinese: 正好說了我想說的話，謝啦！
German: Danke, dass du mir aus der Seele sprichst.
